```{r}
seq_sum<-function(start,end,interval){
  the_seq<-seq(start,end,interval)
  the_sum<-sum(the_seq)
  return(list(the_seq,the_sum))
}
seq_sum(1,10,1)
```

```{r}

  sum<-0
  for(i in X)

  return(sum)
}
```
